name: Veil of Maya
description: '''Veil of Maya''' is an American [[metalcore]] band formed in [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], in 2004. The group consists of guitarist Marc Okubo, drummer Sam Applebaum, bassist Danny Hauser and vocalist Lukas Magyar. They are currently signed to [[Sumerian Records]] and have released seven studio albums. Their seventh studio album, ''[[Mother (Veil of Maya album)|Mother]]'', was released on May 12, 2023.
